title: conferred on me by section 18(3) of the Personal Insolvency (Amendment) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Personal Insolvency (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Personal Insolvency (Amendment) Act 

2021 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited personal insolvency (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2021

title: conferred on me by section 18(3) of the Personal Insolvency (Amendment) Act
heading: 2. The 25th day of June 2021 is fixed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 25th day of June 2021 is fixed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Personal Insolvency (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 10 of 2021) 
shall come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

sections 1 to 3; 

sections 5 to 7; 

section 10; 

(d) 

sections 13 and 14; 

(e) 

sections 17 and 18. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 June, 2021. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [305] 3

title: conferred on me by section 18(3) of the Personal Insolvency (Amendment) Act
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order commences sections 1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 10, 13, 14, 17 and 18 of the 
Personal Insolvency (Amendment) Act 2021 with effect from 25 June 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [305]
